content: crochet beginner stripes baby blanket - simple striped blanket easy to crochet and so easy to make wider or longer as the multiples are given in the pattern happy crocheting the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 30 5 x 30 5 inches level intermediate copyright ©2025 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/beginner-stripes-baby-blanket/
